mapper.insert: insert into tasks (user_id, title, description, due_date, priority, status, created_at, updated_at) values (#{userId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{dueDate}, #{priority}, #{status}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update tasks set title = #{title}, description = #{description}, status = #{status}, priority = #{priority}, due_date = #{dueDate}, updated_at = now() where id = #{id} and user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from tasks where id = #{id} and user_id = #{userId}
